paragraphs.original: 话说探春湘云才要走时，忽听外面一个人嚷道：“你这不成人的小蹄子，你是个什么东西，来这园子里头混搅！”黛玉听了，大叫一声道：“这里住不得了！”一手指著窗外，两眼反插上去。
paragraphs.english:
Translated:
As探春 and湘云 were about to leave, they suddenly heard a shout from someone outside: "You little slut who has yet to become a woman, what sort of creature are you to be causing chaos in this garden!" Upon hearing this,黛玉 screamed, "This place is no longer safe!" As she spoke, she pointed to the window outside and stared upwards with her eyes wide open.
paragraphs.chinese:
话说探春、湘云刚要走，忽听一个人在外面大喊：“你这不成人的小淫妇，你算个什么东西，在这园子里瞎胡闹！”黛玉听了，大叫一声说：“这里住不得了！”她一边手指着窗外，一边睁大眼睛向上看。

原文：
话说探春、湘云方走时，忽听外面一个人嚷道：“你这不成人小蹄子，你是个什么东西，来这里混搅！”黛玉听了，大叫一声道：“这里住不得！”手指窗外，两眼反插着。

paragraphs.original: 原来黛玉住在大观园中，虽靠著贾母疼爱，然在别人身上凡事终是寸步留心。听见窗外老婆子这样骂著，－－在别人呢，一句也贴不上的－－竟像专骂著自己的。自思一个千金小姐，只因没了爹娘，不知何人指使这老婆子来这般辱骂，那里委屈得来？因此，肝肠崩裂，哭的晕过去了。紫鹃只是哭叫：“姑娘！怎么样了？快醒来罢！”探春也叫了一回。半晌，黛玉回过这口气，还说不出话来，那只手仍向窗外指著。
paragraphs.english: It was because Lin Daiyu lived in the Grand View Garden under the spoiling of Grandma Jia, and she always had to be on her best behavior, afraid of other people's gossip. But at this moment, hearing the old woman outside the window scolding someone, it seemed that the old woman was scolding her, even though it had nothing to do with her. She wondered why, as a rich and privileged young lady, she was being insulted by an old woman as her, feeling so wronged that she fainted from crying. Zhijuan and Princess Chun heard this and kept calling her to wake up. After a while, Lin Daiyu finally regained her breath, but she was still unable to speak and her fingers were still pointing to the window.
paragraphs.chinese: 这原来是因为林黛玉住在大观园中，靠着贾母疼爱，但在贾府的人眼里总要处处小心，以防人背后说闲话。此时，她听见窗外的老婆子在骂人，这骂声原本与她无关，但似乎骂得就是她。她自问作为千金小姐，不知为何被别人指使的老婆子这般侮辱，委屈难当，哭得晕了过去。紫鹃和探春见状，不停地叫她醒来，半晌之后，黛玉才缓过一口气，但仍然说不出话来，手指还一直指向窗外。

paragraphs.original: 探春会意，开门出去，看见老婆子手中拿著拐棍，赶著一个不乾不净的毛丫头道：“我是为照管这园中的花果树木，来到这里，你作什么来了？等我家去，打你一个知道！”这丫头扭著头，把一个指头探在嘴里，瞅著老婆子笑。探春骂道：“你们这些人，如今越发没了王法了！这里是你骂人的地方儿吗？”老婆子见是探春，连忙陪著笑脸儿，说道：“刚才是我的外孙女儿看见我来了，他就跟了来。我怕他闹，所以才吆喝他回去，那里敢在这里骂人呢？”探春道：“不用多说了，快给我都出去。这里林姑娘身上不大好，还不快去么？”老婆子答应了几个“是”说著，一扭身去了，那丫头也就跑了。
paragraphs.english: Tseng Chun saw that it was the old woman, and left the room. She saw the old woman with a staff in her hand chasing a scullery maid. The old woman said, "Today I came to watch the flowers and plants. What are you doing here? Go away immediately, or I'll hit you if you don't." The maid twisted her head and sucked her finger, laughing at the old woman. Tseng Chun said, "You people are really lawless now! Is this the place to abuse people?" Seeing Tseng Chun, the old woman smiled, "Just now my granddaughter saw me coming and followed me. I was afraid she would cause trouble, so I asked her to leave. How dare she abuse people here?" Tseng Chun said, "Don't talk any more. Get out of here. Miss Lin is not well. Go now." The old woman said a few "yeses" and walked away, while the maid fled.
paragraphs.chinese: 探春看明白了，就开门出去，看见那老婆子手里拿着根拐棍，追着个脏头脏脑的丫鬟。老婆子说：“我今天来是照看这些花花草草树木，你来做什么？你给我快滚！再在这里骂你可就打你了。”这丫鬟扭着头，用指头在嘴里吮着，看着老婆子笑。探春骂道：“你们这些人，越来越没王法了！这里是你骂人的地方儿吗？”老婆子一看是探春，就赔着笑脸说：“刚才我外孙女儿看见我来了，就跟过来了。我怕她闹，所以才叫她回去，敢在这里骂人吗？”探春说：“不用多说了，快给我滚，林姑娘身子不大好，还不快走。”老婆子连说几个“是”，扭身走了，那丫鬟也跑了。

paragraphs.original: 探春回来，看见湘云拉著黛玉的手只管哭，紫鹃一手抱著黛玉，一手给黛玉揉胸口，黛玉的眼睛方渐渐的转过来了。探春笑道：“想是听见老婆子的话，你疑了心了么？”黛玉只摇摇头儿。探春道：“他是骂他外孙女儿。我刚才也听见了。这种东西说话，再没有一点道理的。他们懂得什么避讳！”
paragraphs.english: When Tan Chun returned, she saw Xiang Yun tugging and crying at Dai Yu. Ziyuan hugged Dai Yu and rubbed her chest. Dai Yu's eyes gradually opened. Tan Chun said with a smile, "Afraid you're worrying about it because of what that old woman said?" Dai Yu shook her head. Tan Chun said, "That was the woman cursing her granddaughter, cursing you. I heard it too. People like that never make sense. They know nothing and so they don't know what to avoid."
paragraphs.chinese: 探春回来，看见湘云拉着黛玉哭，紫鹃抱着黛玉揉着她胸口。黛玉的眼睛才渐渐睁开了。探春笑道：“怕是听见老婆子的话，你心里犯起疑来了吧？”黛玉摇了摇头。探春道：“那是骂他外孙女，是骂你。我刚才也听见了，这种人说话，从来就没有道理，他们什么都不懂，怎么避讳！”

paragraphs.original: 黛玉听了，叹了口气，拉著探春的手道：“姐儿－－”叫了一声，又不言语了。探春又道：“你别心烦。我来看你，是姊妹们应该的。你又少人伏侍。只要你安心肯吃药，心上把喜欢事儿想想，能够一天一天的硬朗起来，大家依旧结社做诗，岂不好呢？”湘云道：“可是三姐姐说的，那么著不乐？”黛玉哽咽道：“你们只顾要我喜欢，可怜我那里赶得上这日子？只怕不能够了！”探春道：“你这话说的太过了，谁没个病儿灾儿的？那里就想到这里来了？你好生歇歇儿罢。我们到老太太那边，回来再看你。你要什么东西，只管叫紫鹃告诉我。”黛玉流泪道：“好妹妹！你到老太太那里，只说我请安，身上略有点不好，不是什么大病，也不用老太太烦心的。”探春答应道：“我知道，你只管养著罢。”说著，才同湘云出去了。
paragraphs.english:
Daiyu sighed and took hold of Chun's hand, "Sister—"

she called, but no more could she speak. Then Chun went on, "Don't be angry. I've come to see you for a sister's part, and you need someone to take care of you. As long as you'll stick to your medicine and think of happy things, you'll get better day by day. We'll be able to continue our poetry and verse-writing together. That isn't it, is it?" Huanyun chimed in, "That's just what Sister Chun said. Why are you still unhappy?" Daiyu choked out, "You're only thinking about making me happy, but how can I possibly find happiness? I'm afraid it's too late!" Chun replied, "That's too much. Everyone gets sick. Why would you think it's too late? Just rest and I'll go see the old lady and come back to see you later. If you need anything, tell Zijuan." Daiyu wept and said, "My dear sister! Please go to see the old lady and tell her I sent my respects. I have a little illness, not anything serious, that I can take care of myself." Chun nodded and said, "Okay, rest now." She and Huanyun then left.
paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉听了，叹了一口气，拉着探春的手说：“姐姐啊——”叫了一声，又没有说话了。探春接着说：“你别生气。我来看你，是做妹妹的应该做的，你又少人照顾。只要你安心吃药，心里想一些高兴的事情，能够一天天的恢复起来，大家继续聚在一起写诗作词，岂不是很好？”湘云说：“正是三姐姐说的，你怎么还不高兴呢？”黛玉哽咽着说：“你们只想着让我开心，可我哪里能赶上这一天？只怕不行了！”探春说：“你这么说太过了，谁没有个生病的时候？怎么能想到这个地步呢？你好好休息，我们到老太太那边去，回来再看你。你要什么东西，让紫鹃告诉我。”黛玉流着泪说：“好妹妹！你到老太太那边去，只说我去请安，身上有点小病，不是什么大病，不用老太太担心。”探春答应着说：“我知道了，你只管养着。”说着，她和湘云出去了。

paragraphs.original: 这里紫鹃扶著黛玉躺在床上，地下诸事，自有雪雁照料，自己只守著傍边。看著黛玉，又是心酸，又不敢哭泣。那黛玉闭著眼躺了半晌，那里睡得著？觉得园里头平日只见寂寞，如今躺在床上，偏听得风声，虫鸣声，鸟语声，人走的脚步声，又像远远的孩子们啼哭声，一阵一阵的聒噪的烦躁起来，因叫紫鹃放下帐子来。雪雁捧了一碗燕窝汤，递给紫鹃。紫鹃隔著帐子，轻轻问道：“姑娘，喝一口汤罢？”黛玉微微应了一声。紫鹃复将汤递给雪雁，自己上来，搀扶黛玉坐起，然后接过汤来，搁在唇边试了一试，一手搂著黛玉肩臂，一手端著汤送到唇边。黛玉微微睁眼喝了两三口，便摇摇头儿不喝了。紫鹃仍将碗递给雪雁，轻轻扶黛玉睡下。
paragraphs.english: Zijuan helped Dae-ewu lie down on the bed, and Xueyan attended to the matters on the ground. Zijuan stayed by Dae-ewu's side. Gazing at Dae-ewu, her heart ached, but she dared not cry. Dae-ewu lay in bed for a while but could not fall asleep. She felt that she had only heard the silence of the garden before, but now, she could hear the sound of the wind, the buzzing of insects, the chirping of birds, the sound of footsteps, and even the distant cries. These sounds agitated her, so she asked Zijuan to lower the curtains. Xueyan brought in a bowl of swallow soup and handed it to Zijuan. Zijuan asked softly through the curtains, "Madam, would you like to have a sip of the soup?" Dae-ewu barely responded. Zijuan gave the bowl to Xueyan, then came up to help Dae-ewu sit up, took the bowl, tested its temperature, hugged Dae-ewu's shoulders with one hand, and brought the bowl to Dae-ewu's lips with the other. Dae-ewu slightly opened her eyes and drank a few mouthfuls of the soup before shaking her head to indicate she didn't want to drink anymore. Zijuan then handed the bowl back to Xueyan, gently helping Dae-ewu lie down again.
paragraphs.chinese: 紫鹃扶着黛玉躺在床上，地上的事情由雪雁来照料，紫鹃则守着黛玉。看着黛玉，心中酸楚，但又不敢哭。黛玉躺了半晌，却睡不着。她觉得平时只听见园里的寂寞声，现在躺在床上，却听见风声、虫鸣声、鸟语声、人走的脚步声，还有远处传来的哭泣声，这些声音让她烦躁不已，于是让紫鹃把帐子放下。雪雁端来一碗燕窝汤，递给紫鹃。紫鹃隔着帐子轻声问：“姑娘，喝一口汤吧？”黛玉微微应了一声。紫鹃把汤递给雪雁，然后自己上来扶黛玉坐起，接过汤，试了试温度，一手搂着黛玉的肩膀，一手端着汤送到黛玉的唇边。黛玉微微睁开眼睛，喝了两三口汤，然后摇了摇头表示不想再喝了。紫鹃又把碗递给雪雁，轻轻扶黛玉躺下。

paragraphs.original: 静了一时，略觉安顿只听窗外悄悄问道：“紫鹃妹妹在家么？”雪雁连忙出来，见是袭人，因悄悄说道：“姐姐屋里坐著。”袭人也便悄悄问道：“姑娘怎么著？”一面走，一面雪雁告诉夜间及方才之事。袭人听了这话也吓怔了，因说道：“怪道刚才翠缕到我们那边说你们姑娘病了，吓的宝二爷连忙打发我来看看是怎么样。”
paragraphs.english: (Zhui Juan) After a while, she found that she had calmed down a little and heard the soft question from outside the window, "Is Sister Zhi Juan there?" Xue Yan hurried out and, upon seeing it was Xi Ren, whispered, "Why don't you sit in my room?" Xi Ren then asked softly, "What is the matter with you?" As they walked, Xue Yan told Xi Ren about what had happened that night and the circumstances earlier. When Xi Ren heard this, she was startled. Then she said, "That's why Cui Lu was just over to tell me that the missus was sick, and how frightened Yu Bai was when he sent me over to check on the missus."
paragraphs.chinese: （紫鹃）静了一会，觉得心神稍稍安定一些，只听窗外轻轻问道：“紫鹃妹妹在吗？”雪雁赶紧出来，见是袭人，便悄悄说道：“到姐姐屋里坐一坐吧。”袭人也便悄悄问道：“姑娘您这是怎么了？”一面走，一面雪雁把夜间发生的事以及刚才的情形告诉了袭人。袭人听了这话也吓了一跳，于是说道：“怪不得刚才翠缕到我们那边来说姑娘病了，吓得宝玉连忙派我来看看到底怎么样。”

paragraphs.original: 正说著，只见紫鹃从里间掀起帘子，望外看见袭人，招手儿叫他。袭人轻轻走过来问道：“姑娘睡著了吗？”紫鹃点点头儿，问道：“姐姐才听见说了？”袭人也点点头儿，蹙著眉道：“终久怎么样好呢！那一位昨夜也把我吓了个半死儿！”紫鹃忙问：“怎么了？”袭人道：“昨日晚上睡觉，还是好好儿的。谁知半夜里一叠连声的嚷起心疼来，嘴里胡说白道，只说好像刀子割了去的似的。直闹到打亮梆子以后才好些了。你说吓人不吓人？今日不能上学，还要请大夫来吃药呢。”
paragraphs.english: They were talking when Zijuan came out from the inner room, calling out to Jinsi. "Are you all asleep?" Jinsi asked when she came over. She nodded. "Did you hear me just now?" she asked. Jinsi nodded again. "And how did it go?" she asked. "When I was sleeping last night, I was all right. But I started crying out in pain and mumbling all sorts of things. It was as if my flesh were being cut by a knife. I was still restless till the watchman sounded his drum. Isn't that frightening? I can't go to school today, and I have to ask a doctor to come and give me some medicine."
paragraphs.chinese: 正在说着，只见紫鹃从里间掀帘子走出来，看见袭人，招了招手，想叫她过来。袭人轻轻地走过来，问道：“姑娘睡着了吗？”紫鹃点了点头，问道：“姐姐刚才听见说了吗？”袭人也点了点头，眉头紧锁，说道：“最后怎么样了呢！那一位昨晚也把我吓了一大跳！”紫鹃急忙问：“怎么了？”袭人说：“昨晚睡觉的时候，我还在好好地躺着。谁知道半夜里一声接一声地叫疼，嘴里乱七八糟地说着什么，说好像刀割了一样。一直闹到打亮梆子的时候才好些。你说吓人不吓人？今天不能去上学，还要请医生来开药呢。”

paragraphs.original: 正说著，只听黛玉在帐子里又咳嗽起来，紫鹃连忙过来捧痰盒儿接痰。黛玉微微睁眼问道：“你合谁说话呢？”紫鹃道：“袭人姐姐来瞧姑娘来了。”说著，袭人已走到床前。黛玉命紫鹃扶起，一手指著床边，让袭人坐下。袭人侧身坐了，连忙陪著笑劝道：“姑娘倒还是躺著罢。”黛玉道：“不妨，你们快别这样大惊小怪的。刚才是说谁半夜里心疼起来？”袭人道：“是宝二爷偶然魇住了，不是认真怎么样。”
paragraphs.english: The two were just talking when they heard Dàiyù coughing in the bedchamber again. Zhǔguān hurried to her, holding a bowl to catch her phlegm. "Who are you speaking with?" asked Dàiyù, her eyes barely open. Zhǔguā replied, "It's Lady Xíshēng visiting you." As she spoke, Xíshēng had already reached the bedside. Dàiyù had Zhǔguā help her sit up and pointed to the edge of the bed, beckoning Xíshēng to sit down. Xíshēng sat to the side, smiling and reassuring her, "You should lie down, miss." Dàiyù said, "It's fine. Don't all fuss over me like this. Who was it you were asking about just now, having a stomachache in the middle of the night?" Xíshēng replied, "It was Second Master's occasional nightmare, not a real issue."
paragraphs.chinese: 正在说着，只听黛玉在帐子里又咳嗽起来了，紫鹃连忙走过来，捧起痰盂接痰。黛玉微微睁开眼睛问：“你跟谁说话呢？”紫鹃说：“是袭人姐姐来看姑娘来了。”说着，袭人已经走到床前。黛玉叫紫鹃扶起，用手指着床边，让袭人坐下。袭人侧身坐下，连忙陪着笑劝道：“姑娘还是躺着罢。”黛玉说：“没关系，你们别这样大惊小怪的。刚才说的是谁半夜里心疼？”袭人说：“是宝二爷偶然魇住了，不是真的有什么问题。”

paragraphs.original: 黛玉会意，知道是袭人怕自己又悬心的原故，又感激，又伤心，因趁势问道：“既是魇住了，不听见他还说什么？”袭人道：“也没说什么。”黛玉点点头儿，迟了半日，叹了一声，才说道：“你们别告诉宝二爷说我不好，看耽搁了他的工夫，又叫老爷生气。”袭人答应了，又劝道：“姑娘，还是躺躺歇歇罢。”黛玉点头，命紫鹃扶著歪下。袭人不免坐在旁边，又宽慰了几句，然后告辞，回到怡红院，只说黛玉身上略觉不受用，也没什么大病，宝玉才放了心。
paragraphs.english: The reason why Lin Daiyu was moved and saddened is that Xishi was afraid that Lin Daiyu would still not rest easy. She asks Xishi, "Did that person speak any other words while in a trance?" Xishi replies, "They did not say anything." Lin Daiyu nods, then sighs before continuing, "Don't tell Erbaoyu that I'm not feeling well. Don't let him worry and get his father angry." Xishi agrees, and attempts to console her, "Miss should rest." Lin Daiyu nods, and allows Zijuan to help her lie down. Xishi cannot leave, and reassures her once more before returning to the Red Mansion to inform Erbaoyu that Lin Daiyu is only feeling slightly unwell, with no serious ailment. Only then does Erbaoyu calm down.
paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉听出是袭人怕她又不放心的原故，心里很感动又很伤心，问袭人：“那个人睡魇着了，没说别的话？”袭人回答：“没说什么。”黛玉点点头，过了半晌，叹口气，才说：“你们别告诉宝二爷我不舒服，看耽误了他的事情，又叫老爷生气。”袭人答应，又劝她：“姑娘还是躺下歇歇吧。”黛玉点头，叫紫鹃扶她歪在床上。袭人不好离开，又安慰了两句，然后告辞回怡红院，对宝玉说黛玉身上略觉不舒服，没什么大病，宝玉这才放下心。

paragraphs.original: 且说探春湘云出了潇湘馆，一路往贾母这边来。探春因嘱咐湘云道：“妹妹回来见了老太太，别像刚才那样冒冒失失的了。”湘云点头笑道：“知道了。我头里是叫他吓的忘了神了。”
paragraphs.english: Let us now follow Princess Chun and Yunyun as they left the Pavilion of the Flowing Spring to visit Grandmother Ji. Princess Chun reminded Yunyun, "When you meet Grandmother Ji, don't be so reckless, as you were just now." Yunyun nodded, laughing, and replied, "I know. I was so frightened that I lost my wits."
paragraphs.chinese: 且说探春、湘云出了潇湘馆，往贾母这边来。探春嘱咐湘云：“妹妹回去见了老太太，别像刚才那样冒冒失失的了。”湘云点头笑道：“知道了。我刚才吓的忘了神了。”

paragraphs.original: 说著，已到贾母那边，探春因提起黛玉的病来。贾母听了，自是心烦，因说道：“偏是这两个玉儿多病多灾的。林丫头一来二去的大了，他这个身子也要紧。我看那孩子太是个心细。”众人也不敢答言。贾母便向鸳鸯道：“你告诉他们，明儿大夫来瞧了宝玉，叫他再到林姑娘那屋里去。”鸳鸯答应著出来，告诉了婆子们。婆子们自去传话。这里探春湘云就跟著贾母吃了晚饭，然后同回园中去。不提。
paragraphs.english:
The translation is as follows:

As she spoke, she had reached her grandmother's residence, and there, at the palace of Princess Qia, mentioned the illness of Lady Dai. Upon hearing this, Grandmother Jia's mind was agitated, and she said, "These two jade orbs are always beset with illness and misfortune. Lady Lin is growing older, and her health is what matters most. I think she's too meticulous." Everyone was hesitant to speak. Grandmother Jia then turned to Qianyang and said, "Tell them that tomorrow, after the doctor has treated Young Master Yu, have him also attend to Lady Lin." Qianyang nodded in agreement and went out to inform the servants, who then relayed the message. Afterward, Princess Qia and Lin Xu accompanied Grandmother Jia to finish their dinner, and then returned to the garden. Further discussion is not mentioned.
paragraphs.chinese: 说着，已到贾母那边，探春提到黛玉的病。贾母听了心烦，说：“偏偏这两个玉儿多灾多病的。林丫头年纪大了，身体要紧。我看她太心细。”众人都不敢说话。贾母对鸳鸯说：“你告诉他们，明儿大夫来给宝玉瞧病后，叫他再去给林姑娘瞧病。”鸳鸯答应着出来，告诉了婆子们，婆子们自去传话。然后探春和湘云跟贾母吃完晚饭，一同回到园里。不提。

paragraphs.original: 到了次日，大夫来了。瞧了宝玉，不过说饮食不调，著了点儿风邪，没大要紧，疏散疏散就好了。这里王夫人凤姐等，一面遣人拿了方子回贾母；一面使人到潇湘馆，告诉说：“大夫就过来。”紫鹃答应了，连忙给黛玉盖好被窝，放下帐子，雪雁赶著收拾房里的东西。
paragraphs.english: The next day, the doctor came and examined Yu Bei. He said that he had just eaten the wrong food and had caught a little cold, so it wasn't serious. It would be all right once he took the medicine. Wang Fei, Feng Zhi, and the others hurried to have the doctor's prescription taken to the old lady. They also sent someone to tell Dahu to say that the doctor was coming to see her. Zijuan said that she would and immediately covered Dahu's bed and drew the curtains around her. Xiaoyan quickly packed up the things in the room.
paragraphs.chinese: 第二天，大夫来了，看了宝玉，说他只不过是吃了错东西，着了点风邪，不大要紧，散散就好了。王夫人、凤姐等人忙叫人把大夫的方子拿给贾母看，又派人到潇湘馆告诉黛玉，大夫要过来看她。紫鹃答应了，忙给黛玉盖好被窝，放下帐子，雪雁赶紧收拾好房里的东西。

paragraphs.original: 一时，贾琏陪著大夫进来了，便说道：“这位老爷是常来的，姑娘们不用回避。”老婆子打起帘子，贾琏让著，进入房中坐下。贾琏道：“紫鹃姐姐，你先把姑娘的病势向王老爷说说。”王大夫道：“且慢说。等我诊了脉，听我说了，看是对不对。若有不合的地方，姑娘们再告诉我。”紫鹃便向帐中扶出黛玉的一只手来，搁在“迎手”上。紫鹃又把镯子连袖子轻轻的撸起，不叫压住了脉息。
paragraphs.english: At this moment, Jialan accompanied the doctor to enter, saying, "This is a regular visitor. The ladies need not withdraw." The old nurse lifted the curtain and Jialan invited him to sit in the room. Jialan said to Ziduan, "Big Sis Ziduan, tell Old Master Wang about the condition of the lady." Doctor Wang said, "Let's take it slow. First let me take the lady's pulse. After I have done that, I will tell you. If there are things I'm not sure of, please tell me." Ziduan helped to remove the lady's hand from the bed and placed it on her own chest. She then rolled up her bracelet and sleeve, so that the pulse would not be blocked.
paragraphs.chinese: 这时候，贾琏陪着医生进来了，说：“这位老先生是常来的，姑娘们不用回避。”老妈妈掀开帘子，贾琏让着进房坐下。贾琏对紫鹃说：“紫鹃姐姐，你先把姑娘的病情向王老先生讲一讲。”王大夫说：“慢点说。等我先号脉，听我说了，看我说的对不对。如果有不对的地方，姑娘们再告诉我。”紫鹃从帐子里扶出黛玉一只手，放在自己衣襟上。紫鹃又把镯子和袖子轻轻卷起，不让压住脉息。

paragraphs.original: 那王大夫诊了好一会儿，又换那只手也诊了，便同贾琏出来，到外间屋里坐下，说道：“六脉皆弦，因平日郁结所致。”说著，紫鹃也出来，站在里间门口。
paragraphs.english:
Dr. Wang examined him carefully for a while, and then took his pulse again with the other hand. "All his pulses are wiry," he said, "caused by a long-standing郁结 in his system."

As he spoke, Zijuan came out, standing at the door of the inner room.
paragraphs.chinese: 王大夫仔细诊了半晌，又换手再诊了脉，便同贾琏出来到外屋坐下，说道：“六脉都是弦脉，都是平时郁结所致。”说着，紫鹃也出来了，站在里屋门口。

paragraphs.original: 那王大夫便向紫鹃道：“这病时常应得头晕，减饮食，多梦；每到五更，必醒个几次；即日间听见不干自己的事，也必要动气，且多疑多惧。不知者疑为性情乖诞，其实因肝阴亏损，心气衰耗，都是这个病在那里作怪。－－不知是否？”紫鹃点点头儿，向贾琏道：“说的很是。”王太医道：“既这样就是了。”说毕，起身同贾琏往外书房去开方子。小厮们早已预备下一张梅红单帖。王太医吃了茶，因提笔先写道：

紫鹃问：“那么，应当如何治疗呢？”王大夫回答：“治疗此病需要补肝阴，养心气。服用药物的同时，患者应调整饮食，避免辛辣刺激食物，保持心情舒畅，适量运动。还需保证充足的睡眠，避免过度疲劳。此外，精神调养也十分重要，应尽量避免情绪波动，保持乐观心态。”紫鹃说：“了解了，我会转告给太太的。”贾琏也表示赞同，并表示会根据医嘱调整家庭生活和工作安排。王太医在确认了所有细节后，满意地点点头，说：“按照医嘱行事，应该能有效缓解病情。你们多加注意，如有任何不适，请随时前来复诊。”随后，他与贾琏道别，离开了书房，留下紫鹃和贾琏继续讨论后续的治疗方案。
paragraphs.chinese:
王大夫对紫鹃说：“这病常常要头晕，吃的东西要减少，做梦特别多。每天的五更时，他必须醒好几次。到了白天，听见与自己无关的事，也必要动气，还多疑多惧。不知内情的人把他疑为性情古怪，其实是因为肝阴亏损，心气衰弱，都是这个病在作怪。不知道对不对？”紫鹃点点头，对贾琏说：“他说得很对。”王太医说：“既然这样就是这样的病了。”说完起身同贾琏去书房开药方。小厮们已经准备好一张梅花笺的单子。王太医喝了茶，提笔先写道：

paragraphs.original: 六脉弦迟，素由积郁。左寸无力，心气已衰。关脉独洪，肝邪偏旺。木气不能疏达，势必上侵脾土，饮食无味；甚至胜所不胜，肺金定受其殃。气不流精，凝而为痰；血随气涌，自然咳吐。理宜疏肝保肺，涵养心脾。虽有补剂，未可骤施。姑拟“黑逍遥”以开其先，复用“归肺固金”以继其后。不揣固陋，俟高明裁服。又将七味药与引子写了。
paragraphs.english:
Take the pulse and it is thin and weak. This is a result of long-term stagnation and depression, and it indicates that the Heart Qi has already weakened. The prominent and large pulse at the left guan suggests the Liver Qi is overly dominant. The Wood Qi is unable to dispel and will inevitably invade the Earth Qi, affecting digestion and potentially leading to lung Qi being affected as well. When the Qi is not circulating properly, it can condense into phlegm; with Qi moving with the blood, this naturally leads to coughing and expectoration. Treatment should focus on clearing the Liver to protect the Lung, while also nourishing the Heart and Spleen. Although nourishing medicines are needed, they should not be used immediately. I suggest starting with the "Black Joyful Excursion" formula to open the path, followed by the "Return to the Lung to Fortify the Metal" formula for continuous treatment. Please allow a knowledgeable doctor to consider these suggestions before proceeding with treatment.

Write down the formulas for the seven ingredients and their accompanying formulas.
paragraphs.chinese:
脉象细弱，这是由于长期郁结所引起，左寸无力，说明心气已经衰弱；关脉独洪，是肝气偏盛的表现，木气不能疏泄，势必会往上侵犯脾土，影响饮食，甚至于肺金也会受到侵犯。气不流通精气，会凝结成痰；气随着血涌动，自然会导致咳嗽和吐痰。治疗时应该疏肝保肺，同时滋养心脾，虽然需要补药，但不宜立即使用，我先拟定“黑逍遥”方剂来开路，再用“归肺固金”方剂来接续治疗。请高明的医生斟酌后给予治疗。

又将七味药以及引子的配方都写下来。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏拿来看时，问道：“血势上冲，柴胡使得么？”王大夫笑道：“二爷但知柴胡是升提之品，为吐衄所忌，岂知用鳖血拌炒，非柴胡不足宣少阳甲胆之气。以鳖血制之，使其不致升提，且能培养肝阴，制遏邪火。所以《内经》说：‘通因通用，塞因塞用。’柴胡用鳖血拌炒，正是‘假周勃以安刘’的法子。”贾琏点头道：“原来是这么著。这就是了。”王大夫又道：“先请服两剂，再加减，或再换方子罢。我还有一点小事，不能久坐，容日再来请安。”说著，贾琏送了出来，说道：“舍弟的药就是那么著了？”王大夫道：“宝二爷倒没什么大病，大约再吃一剂就好了。”说著，上车而去。
paragraphs.english: Jialan took the prescription and asked Doctor Wang, "If you look at this prescription, should we increase the amount of Bupleurum?" Doctor Wang replied with a smile, "Young Master Jialan only knows that Bupleurum has the function of elevating and lifting, but it is not suitable for cases of blood heat causing excessive bleeding, hemoptysis, etc. He doesn't know that Bupleurum should be mixed and cooked with turtle blood to activate its dispersive function in the minor yang and gall meridians. By preparing Bupleurum with turtle blood, we can prevent its elevating nature and nourish liver yin, suppressing the evil fire. The Yellow Emperor's Classic states 'Treating with the pathogenic to treat the disease, treating obstruction with free flow,' meaning that using turtle blood to prepare Bupleurum is a method to 'use Zhou Bo to secure the stability of Liu'." Jialan nodded and said, "So that's the reason. That makes sense." Doctor Wang continued, "Let the patient take two doses of the medicine first, then adjust the dosage based on the changes in their condition, or switch to another prescription. There's also a small matter I need to attend to, I'll pay you another visit another day." After saying this, Jialan sent him to the door and asked, "What about your brother's prescription?" Doctor Wang replied, "Young Master Jialan's condition is not serious, one dose of medicine should be enough to recover." With that, he got into his carriage and left.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏接过药方来看，问王大夫说：“你看这药方，是否要加大柴胡的用量？”王大夫笑着回答说：“二爷只知道柴胡有升提之功，不适合用于血热妄行，吐血、衄血等情况。却不知道要用鳖血拌炒柴胡，才能发挥柴胡宣散少阳甲胆之气的作用。用鳖血来制备柴胡，可以防止其升提之性，又可以滋养肝阴，抑制邪火。《内经》中说‘通因通用，塞因塞用’，就是说用鳖血拌炒柴胡，正是‘假周勃以安刘’的治疗方法。”贾琏点头说：“原来是这么回事。这就对了。”王大夫又说：“先让病人服两剂药，根据病情的变化再加减药量，或者再换一个方子。我这里还有一件小事，不能久坐，改日再来拜访。”说完，贾琏送他到门口，问说：“你弟弟的药方就那么处理了？”王大夫回答说：“二爷的病情并不严重，吃一剂药应该就能好了。”说着，便上车离开了。

paragraphs.original: 这里贾琏一面叫人抓药，一面回到房中去告诉凤姐，黛玉的病原与大夫用的药，述了一遍。只见周瑞家的走来，回了几件没要紧的事。贾琏听到一半，便说道：“你回二奶奶罢，我还有事呢。”说著，就走了。
paragraphs.english: Jialin, while having someone fetch medicine, returned to his room and told Fengzhu the cause of Lady Lai's illness and the prescription of the doctor. Then Zhou Rui's wife walked in and told him about a few trivial matters. Jialin listened to half of her words and said, "Tell my wife, I have something to attend to." Then he left.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏一面叫人抓药，一面回到屋里，给凤姐说了黛玉的病因和医生开的药。这时周瑞家的走了进来，告诉他几件不重要的事情。贾琏只听了一半，就说：“你告诉二奶奶吧，我还有事呢。”说完，他就离开了。

paragraphs.original: 周瑞家的回完了这件事，又说道：“我方才到林姑娘那边，看他那个病，竟是不好呢：脸上一点血色也没有，摸了摸，身上只剩了一把骨头。问问他，也没有话说，只是淌眼泪。回来紫鹃告诉我说：‘姑娘现在病著，要什么，自己又不肯要，我打算要问二奶奶那里支用一两个月的月钱。如今吃药，虽是公中的，零用也得几个钱。’我答应了他，替他来回奶奶。”凤姐低了半日头，说道：“竟这么著罢：我送他几两银子使罢。也不用告诉林姑娘。这月钱却是不好支的。一个人开了例，要是都支起来，那如何使得呢？你不记得赵姨娘和三姑娘拌嘴了？也无非为的是月钱。况且近来你也知道，出去的多，进来的少，总绕不过弯儿来。不知道的，还说我打算的不好。更有那一种嚼舌根的，说我搬运到娘家去了。周嫂子，你倒是那里经手的人，这个自然还知道些。”
paragraphs.english: Wu Rui's servant finished her report and said, "I just went to visit Miss Lin, and she seemed very pale and skinny. I asked her, but she was crying. When I got back, Ezhu told me that she's been sick and refuses everything. She wants to ask you for some money to buy medicine. Although there is a public fund for medicine, she needs some extra money for other expenses. I agreed and came back to report to you." Mrs. Feng thought for a moment and said, "I think I should give her some silver. Don't tell Miss Lin. If everyone started asking for money, we wouldn't have enough. You wouldn't believe how much goes out compared to how little comes in. It's always difficult. People think I'm being miserly, but the truth is, we're short on funds. It's even worse when someone tries to make trouble, saying I've taken money for my family. Mrs. Zhou, you're in charge of these matters, so you understand."
paragraphs.chinese: 周瑞家的把这件事回完后，又说：“我刚才到林姑娘那边去了，看见她脸色苍白，身体干瘦。问她，她却哭个不停。回来紫鹃告诉我，说是姑娘生病了，要什么也不肯要，她打算去求二奶奶支用一些。买药虽然有公费，但是其他零用也得一些钱。我答应了她，就回来向奶奶回话了。”凤姐想了会，说：“这样吧，我给她送一些银子吧。不用告诉林姑娘。这个月钱不好支，如果大家都支用，那怎么办呢？你不知道，出去的多，进来的少，总有些难为。不知道的人还以为我节省呢。更糟糕的是，有人喜欢搬弄是非，说我把钱挪到娘家去了。周嫂子，你是经手的人，这些自然知道。”

paragraphs.original: 周瑞家的道：“真正委屈死人！这样大门头儿，除了奶奶这样心计儿当家罢了。别说是女人当不来，就是三头六臂的男人，还撑不住呢。还说这些个混账话！”说著，又笑了一声道：“奶奶还没听见呢，外头的人还更糊涂呢！前儿，周瑞回家来，说起外头的人，打量著偺们府里不知怎么样有钱呢。也有说：‘贾府里的银库几间，金库几间，使的家伙都是金子镶了，玉石嵌了的。’也有说：‘姑娘做了王妃，自然皇上家的东西分了一半子给娘家。前儿贵妃娘娘省亲回来，我们还亲见他带了几车金银回来，所以家里收拾摆设的水晶宫似的。那日在庙里还愿，花了几万银子，只算是牛身上拔了一根毛罢咧。’有人还说：‘他门前的狮子，只怕还是玉石的呢！园子里还有金麒麟，叫人偷了一个去，如今剩下一个了。家里的奶奶姑娘不用说，就是屋里使唤的姑娘们，也是一点儿不动的，喝酒下棋，弹琴画画，横竖有人伏侍呢，单管穿罗罩纱；吃的带的，都是人家不认得的。那些哥儿姐儿们，更不用说了，要天上的月亮，也有人去拿下来给他玩。’还有歌儿呢，说是：‘宁国府，荣国府，金银财宝如粪土。吃不穷，穿不穷，算来－－。’”说到这里，猛然咽住。原来那歌儿说道：“算来总是一场空。”这周瑞家的说溜了嘴，说到这里，忽然想起这话不好，因咽住了。
paragraphs.english: Chou Zuijia said, "This is truly driving people to despair. In such a large family, besides the old lady who can handle things, even men are hard to manage. Forget about women; even men with three heads and six arms would find it hard to hold it all together. And they are talking senseless rubbish!" After saying this, she gave a cold smile and added, "The old lady doesn’t know this, but the outside world is even more bewildered. The other day, when Zhou Rui came home, he said that everyone outside was making bets about how much gold and silver and treasure our family must have. Some said we had separate gold and silver stores, and that the things we used were all inlaid with jade. Others said that the Princess Royal had given us half of the treasures of the emperor’s palace because she had married into our family. When the Princess Royal returned from her visit to the imperial palace, we saw her bring back several carriages full of gold and silver. That’s why we have decorated our house like a crystal palace. In the temple the other day, we burned away a few thousand taels of silver, but that was only scratching the surface. Others said that the lions outside the gate must be jade, and that there’s a golden tortoise in the garden, which someone stole, leaving only the last one. The old ladies and young misses in the family don’t have to do anything, they just dress in silk, wear sheer gowns, drink wine, play chess, play the zither, and draw pictures, with servants serving them, so they don’t even have to worry about the maids in their rooms. The young misses don’t even move an inch; they just eat, drink, and dress, and they are all so different from the people in the outside world that they can’t be recognized. As for the young noblemen and ladies, they can get the moon from the heavens if they want to. There are songs that say, 'Ningguo Mansion and Rongguo Mansion are filled with gold and silver, like waste soil. We can’t be too rich, we can’t be too poor, as long as we have that.' " She stopped speaking when she reached this part. For the song says, "But in the end, it’s all for naught." Miss Zhou Rui’s tongue was too quick for her own good, and she suddenly remembered that this line was not good, so she stopped speaking.
paragraphs.chinese: 周瑞家的说：“这真是委屈死人了，这样的大家庭，除了奶奶能管事，连男人都管不过来。别说女人管不了，就是有三头六臂的男人，也把持不了。还说些没脑子的话！”说罢，又冷笑了一声道：“奶奶不知道吧？外面的人更糊涂了。前儿，周瑞回家来，说外面的人都在打赌，说咱们府里不知有多少金银财宝，说有的是银库金库，用的家伙全是金镶玉嵌。也有的说，姑娘做了王妃，自然天子家的东西分了一半给娘家。前儿贵妃娘娘省亲回来，我们亲眼看见带了几车金银回来，所以家里收拾摆设得像水晶宫。那天在庙里还愿，花了几万两银子，只算牛身上的毛罢了。还有人说，他门口的狮子只怕是玉石做的。园子里还有金麒麟，叫人偷了一个去，现在剩下最后一个了。家里的奶奶姑娘，用不着做什么，只是穿罗罩纱，喝酒下棋，弹琴画画，还有人服侍着，不用说屋里的丫鬟，就是姑娘们，也是一点动不动，只是吃喝穿戴，都是人家认不得的。那些公子小姐们，更是不用说了，要天上的月亮，也有人去拿下来给他们玩。还有歌儿说，‘宁国府、荣国府，金银财宝如粪土。吃不穷，穿不穷，算来。’”说到这儿，忽然住了口。原来那歌儿说：“算来总是一场空。”这周瑞家的说嘴太快了，说到这儿，忽然想起这话不好，于是住了口。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐儿听了，已明白必是句不好的话了，也不便追问。因说道：“那都没要紧，只是这‘金麒麟’的话从何而来？”周瑞家的笑道：“就是那庙里的老道士送给宝二爷的小金麒麟儿。后来丢了几天，亏了史姑娘捡著，还了他，外头就造出这个谣言来了。奶奶说，这些人可笑不可笑？”凤姐道：“这些话倒不是可笑，倒是可怕的！偺们一日难似一日，外面还是这么讲究。俗语儿说的，‘人怕出名猪怕壮’，况且又是个虚名儿。终久还不知怎么样呢！”周瑞家的道：“奶奶虑的也是。只是满城里，茶坊酒铺儿以及各衚同儿，都是这样说，况且不是一年了，那里握的住众人的嘴？”凤姐点点头儿。因叫平儿称了几两银子，递给周瑞家的道：“你先拿去交给紫鹃，只说我给他添补买东西的。若要官中的，只管要去，别提这月钱的话。他也是个伶透人，自然明白我的话。我得了空儿，就去瞧姑娘去。”周瑞家的接了银子，答应著自去。不提。
paragraphs.english: Jingjing heard this and knew that it must have been an unpleasant story. She didn't press for details, and instead asked, "Well, what about this golden carp? Where did it come from?" Zhou Rui replied with a chuckle, "It was a golden carp given by the old monk at the temple to Young Master Baiyu. He lost it for a few days, and then Miss Shi found it and returned it to him. That's where the rumor came from. Now, Madam, what do you think of this?" Jingjing replied, "It's not particularly funny, but it's quite worrying. Our days are getting harder, yet people are still fussing over this kind of reputation. Old sayings tell us that 'fame is like a boar when it gets big', and this is a kind of false fame. Who knows what might happen?" Zhou Rui added, "Madam, you're right to be concerned, but everyone in the city is talking about this. We can't control what everyone says." Jingjing nodded and told Ping'er to hand over several taels of silver to Zhou Rui. She said, "You can take this to Purple Spring. Just tell her that I'm giving her a little extra for expenses. Don't mention the monthly allowance, and she'll understand my intentions. I'll visit Miss Shi when I have time." Zhou Rui accepted the silver and left. We'll leave it at that for now.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐听了，知道必是不好的话了，就没有再问。只说：“没有关系的，可是那金麒麟的话怎么来的？”周瑞家笑道：“就是那庙里的老道士送给宝玉哥哥的金麒麟。后来丢了几天，被史姑娘捡到，还给了他，这才闹出了这个谣言。奶奶说，这些事儿可笑不可笑？”凤姐道：“这事儿倒不怎么可笑，可是有些可怕。我们这日子越来越不好过，外面却还在讲究这些虚名。老话儿说的，‘人怕出名猪怕壮’，况且这又是虚名。还不知道会怎么样呢！”周瑞家的道：“奶奶担心也是对的。可是满城的人都在说，不止一年了，我们怎么能管得住大家的嘴呢？”凤姐点点头，吩咐平儿拿了几两银子，交给周瑞家的，说：“你先给紫鹃送去，就说这是我给她添点东西用的。要是需要宫中的东西，尽管来拿，别提这月钱的事。她聪明人，自然明白我的意思。我有空儿，就去看望姑娘。”周瑞家的接过银子，答应着就离开了。这里就不多提了。

paragraphs.original: 且说贾琏走到外面，只见一个小厮迎上来回道：“大老爷叫二爷说话呢。”贾琏急忙过来，见了贾赦。贾赦道：“方才风闻宫里头传了一个太医院御医、两个吏目去看病，想来不是宫女儿下人了。这几天，娘娘宫里有什么信儿没有？”贾琏道：“没有。”贾赦道：“你去问问二老爷和你珍大哥；不然，还该叫人去到太医院里打听打听才是。”
paragraphs.english: “Again, when Jialiang went out, he saw a boy running up to tell him that the High Lord was calling him for a talk. Jialiang hurried over, and met with Jiasai. Jiasai asked, "I heard that the imperial doctors and two officers were sent to the palace to examine someone. It can't be one of the Empress's daughters or servants. Has there been any news from the Empress's palace these days?" Jialiang answered, "No." Jiasai said, "Go and ask your elder brother, and Father. Or, you should go to the imperial hospital and ask about it."”
paragraphs.chinese: 再说贾琏走到外面，只见一个小厮迎上前来告诉他：“大老爷叫你去谈话。”贾琏赶快过来，见到了贾赦。贾赦问：“刚才听说宫里派了太医院御医和两个吏目去看病，想来不是宫里的女儿或者是下人了。这几天，皇后宫里有什么消息没有？”贾琏说：“没有。”贾赦说：“你去问问二老爷和你珍大哥；否则，还该叫人到太医院里打听打听才是。”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏答应了，一面吩咐人往太医院去，一面连忙去见贾政贾珍。贾政听了这话，因问道：“是那里来的风声？”贾琏道：“是大老爷才说的。”贾政道：“你索性和你珍大哥到里头打听打听。”贾琏道：“我已经打发人往太医院打听去了。”一面说著，一面退出来去找贾珍。只见贾珍迎面来了，贾琏忙告诉贾珍。贾珍道：“我正为也听见这话，来回大老爷二老爷去呢。”于是两人同著来见贾政。贾政道：“如系元妃，少不得终有信的。”说著，贾赦也过来了。
paragraphs.english: Jialin agreed, and sent someone to the imperial medical agency to find out what was happening, and hurried to see Jia Zheng and Jia Zhen. When Jia Zheng heard Jialin's story, he asked, "Where did you hear this?" Jialin replied, "Father just told me." Jia Zheng said, "Go inside and ask Jia Zhen." Jialin answered, "I've already sent someone to the imperial medical agency." Then, he went out to find Jia Zhen, who was walking towards him. Jialin quickly told Jia Zhen about the news. Jia Zhen said, "I just heard this news too, and I'm going to tell Father and Uncle." The two of them went to see Jia Zheng. Jia Zheng said, "If it's about Empress Yuan, we'll know soon enough." As they spoke, Jia Sha came over, and they continued their conversation.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏答应了，一面吩咐人到太医院去打听，一面连忙去见贾政和贾珍。贾政听了贾琏的话，问：“是哪里传出来的消息？”贾琏说：“是父亲刚才说的。”贾政说：“你跟珍哥哥去里面问一问。”贾琏说：“我已经派人去太医院打听消息了。”一边说，一边出来去找贾珍。只见贾珍迎面走来，贾琏急忙把这件事告诉了贾珍。贾珍说：“我也刚刚听说这个消息，准备去跟父亲和二伯说。”于是两人一起去见贾政。贾政说：“如果是元妃的事，过不了多久一定会有消息的。”说话间，贾赦也过来了。

paragraphs.original: 到了晌午，打听的尚未回来，门上人进来回说：“有两个内相在外，要见二位老爷呢。”贾赦道：“请进来。”门上的人领了老公进来。贾赦贾政迎至二门外，先请了娘娘的安，一面同著进来，走至厅上，让了坐。老公道：“前日这里贵妃娘娘有些欠安，昨日奉过旨意，宣召亲丁四人，进里头探问。许各带丫头一人，馀皆不用。亲丁男人，只许在宫门外递个职名请安听信，不得擅入。准于明日辰巳时进去，申酉时出来。”
paragraphs.english:
翻译：
At midday, when no one had returned from the reconnaissance, a message arrived from outside: "Two eunuchs have come to see the Master." Jia Pa said, "Let them in." The messenger led the eunuchs inside. Jia Pa and Jia Zhen met them at the Second Gate, first paying their respects to the Queen, then proceeding to the hall where they were seated. The eunuchs said, "Two days ago, Empress Xuan had some discomfort. Yesterday, she ordered a meeting with four of her closest relatives to come and visit her. They are each allowed to bring one maidservant, but no one else is permitted. The male relatives are only allowed to report their names at the palace gate and pay their respects to Her Imperial Majesty, with no permission to enter. They are authorized to enter at the time of the Chinese zodiac's 'Wu' and 'Wei' (corresponding to 9am to 11am) tomorrow, and leave between 'Shen' and 'Xi' (3pm to 5pm)."

Notes:

1. Eunuch: An official appointed by the Emperor.
2. Mother: Refers to Empress Xuan, Jia Zhen's eldest daughter, Yunchun.
3. Husband: Jia Zhen.
4. Empress Xuan: Yunchun, then known as the Empress.
5. Allow: Xǔ (许).
6. Official's name: Zhí míng (职名).
7. Unlawfully: Shàn (擅).
8. Wu Wei: Chinese zodiac's 9am to 11am.
9. Shen Xi: Chinese zodiac's 3pm to 5pm.
paragraphs.chinese:
中午时分，打探的人还没有回来，外头传来话来：“有两个太监来见老爷。”贾赦道：“请进来。”门上的人领了太监进来。贾赦和贾政在二门外迎接，先给娘娘请安，然后同进至厅上，让了坐。太监道：“前天贵妃娘娘有些不舒服，昨天奉旨召见四个近亲，来探望娘娘。许各带一个丫鬟，其余的不许带。近亲的男丁只许在宫门外报个职名，向娘娘请安听命，不许擅入。准于明日辰巳时进去，申酉时出来。”

注释：

内相：太监。

娘娘：这里指贵妃，贾政的长女元春。

老公：太监。

贵妃：元春。当时元春被封为贵妃。

许：许准。准许。

职名：名册。

擅：擅自。擅入就是未经许可而擅自进入。

辰巳：十二时辰，指上午九时至十一时。

申酉：十二时辰，指下午三点至五点。 

读音：
内相：nà xiàng。
娘娘：wáng náng。
老公：gōng bāng。
贵妃：guì fēi。
许：xǔ。
职名：zhí míng。
擅：shàn。
辰巳：chén sì。
申酉：shēn yǒu。

paragraphs.original: 贾政贾赦等站著听了旨意，复又坐下，让老公吃茶毕，老公辞了出去。贾赦贾政送出大门，回来先禀贾母。贾母道：“亲丁四人，自然是我和你们两位太太了。那一个人呢？”众人也不敢答言。贾母想了想，道：“必得是凤姐儿，他诸事有照应。你们爷儿们各自商量去罢。”
paragraphs.english: After hearing the imperial edict, Jia Zheng and Jia Sheng stood up. The eunuch had tea and then left. Jia Sheng and Jia Zheng escorted the eunuch all the way out to the main gate before returning. They then went to report to Madam Jia. Madam Jia said, "There are four family members mentioned in the edict. Naturally, there are my two wives and I. Who else is mentioned?" Everyone hesitated to answer. Madam Jia thought for a moment and said, "It must be Third Sister, she always makes arrangements for everything. You men should go and discuss it among yourselves."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政、贾赦等人站着听了圣旨后，才坐下。老公公吃完茶就告退了。贾赦、贾政一直送老公公到大门才回来。回来后，先向贾母报告。贾母说：“亲丁四人，当然是我和你两位太太了。还有哪一位呢？”大家都不敢回答。贾母想了想，说：“一定是凤姐了，她对所有事情都有安排。你们爷儿几个自己去商量吧。”

paragraphs.original: 贾赦贾政答应了出来，因派了贾琏贾蓉看家外，凡“文”字辈至“草”字辈一应都去。遂吩咐家人预备四乘绿轿，十馀辆翠盖车，明儿黎明伺候。家人答应去了。贾赦贾政又进去回明贾母：“辰巳时进去，申酉时出来。今日早些歇歇，明日好早些起来，收拾进宫。”贾母道：“我知道，你们去罢。”赦政等退出。这里邢夫人、王夫人、凤姐儿也都说了一会子元妃的病，又说了些闲话，才各自散了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Shai and Jia Zheng went out as instructed by their father, leaving Jia Lang and Jia Rong in charge at home. They were joined by members of the younger generation from the "wen" era to the "cao" era. Jia Shai and Jia Zheng then instructed the servants to prepare four green sedan chairs and over ten carriages with green canopies to be ready for them at dawn the next day. The servants went to do their duties, and Jia Shai and Jia Zheng reported back to their grandmother, informing her that they would enter the palace at the time of the morning watch and exit at the time of the evening watch, and would take a rest first to ensure that they could get up early and prepare for their entry the next day. Their grandmother acknowledged their plan, and Jia Shai and Jia Zheng left. Lady邢, Lady Wang, and Fengzhai also spoke about the condition of the Imperial Consort and some trivial matters before they all went their separate ways.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾赦、贾政答应着出去了，让贾琏、贾蓉看家，族中的后辈去的有“文”字辈到“草”字辈的。贾赦、贾政又吩咐家人准备四顶绿轿，十多辆翠盖车，明天黎明时分等候。家人们答应着去了。贾赦、贾政又进去向贾母报告说，明天辰时巳时进去，申时酉时出来，先休息一下，明天好早些起来，收拾进宫。贾母说知道了，贾赦、贾政退出。邢夫人、王夫人、凤姐儿也都说了些元妃的病情，又说了些闲话，才各自散了。

paragraphs.original: 次日黎明，各屋子里丫头们将灯火俱已点齐，太太们各梳洗毕，爷们亦各整顿好了。一到卯初，林之孝合赖大进来，至二门口回道：“轿车俱已齐备，在门外伺候著呢。”不一时，贾赦邢夫人也过来了。大家用了早饭，凤姐先扶老太太出来，众人围随，各带使女一人，缓缓前行。又命李贵等二人先骑马去外宫门接应。自己家眷随后。“文”字辈至“草”字辈各自登车骑马，跟著众家人，一齐去了。贾琏贾蓉在家中看家。
paragraphs.english: After dawn the maids in all the rooms lit the lamps and the ladies had finished washing up, and the men had also tidied up. By the time the second hour struck, Lin Zhixiao and Lai Da had come in to report that the sedan chairs were ready and waiting for them outside. Soon, the Honorable Jia Shide and his wife, Lady Xing, arrived. Everyone had breakfast, and Lady Feng led the way out with her mother-in-law in tow, followed by the rest. Each of them brought a servant with them as they moved slowly forward. Fengzheng ordered Li Gui and another man to ride their horses to the outer palace gates to meet the rest of the family. The others would follow. The "wen" and "cao" generations got in their carriages and rode off with the rest of the servants. Jia Lin and Jia Rong stayed behind to mind the house.
paragraphs.chinese: 第二天黎明，各屋里的丫头们把灯火全点着了，太太们也梳洗完毕，男人们也都整理好了。一到卯时，林之孝和赖大进来，到二门口回复说：“轿车都已经准备好了，在门外等候呢。”不一会儿，贾赦和邢夫人也来了。大家吃了早饭，凤姐先扶着老太太出来，众人围绕着她，各带着一个使女，缓缓地行走。又吩咐李贵等二人先骑马去外宫门接应。自家眷随后。 “文”字辈和“草”字辈的人各自登车骑马，跟着众家的仆人，一齐出发了。贾琏和贾蓉在家看家。

paragraphs.original: 且说贾家的车辆轿马俱在外西垣门口歇下等著。一会儿，有两个内监出来说道：“贾府省亲的太太奶奶们，著令入宫探问；爷们，俱著令内宫门外请安，不得入见。”门上人叫快进去。贾府中四乘轿子跟著小内监前行，贾家爷们在轿后步行跟著，令众家人在外等候。走近宫门口，只见几个老公在门上坐著。见他们来了，便站起来说道：“贾府爷们至此。”贾赦贾政便捱次立定。轿子抬至宫门口，便都出了轿。早有几个小内监引路，贾母等各有丫头扶著步行。走至元妃寝宫，只见奎壁辉煌，琉璃照耀。又有两个小宫女儿传谕道：“只用请安，一概仪注都免。”
paragraphs.english:
翻译：

The carriages and sedan chairs of the Jia household were halted at the west gate awaiting their arrival. Then, two eunuchs announced, "The ladies who have come to visit and the gentlemen who wish to pay their respects are to enter the palace. None are to be granted an audience." The crowd called out to enter. Four sedan chairs of the Jia household led by a small eunuch were at the front, followed by the Jia men who walked after the sedan chairs. They ordered the crowd to wait outside. As they approached the palace gate, they saw a few old eunuchs sitting on it. Upon their arrival, the old eunuchs stood up and said, "The gentlemen of the Jia household have arrived." Jia Shesp and Jia Zhen stood in line accordingly. When the sedan chairs reached the palace gate, they all disembarked. Two small eunuchs had already guided them in, and the elderly ladies of the Jia household were each assisted by a maid. They reached the Empress Yuanfei's chamber and saw the walls gleaming with brilliance, illuminated by crystal. Two small palace maids then conveyed the emperor's orders, saying, "Only a bow is required, all formalities are to be spared."
paragraphs.chinese:
再说贾府的车马轿子都在西边门停下等待。一会儿，有两名内监出来说：“省亲的各位太太、奶奶们要入宫去探望，各位爷们要到内宫门外请安，不得入见。”门外人喊着进去。贾府中四乘轿子跟着小内监走在前面，贾家的爷们在轿后步行跟着，命令众人在门外等候。走近宫门，只见有几个老宦官坐在门上。见到他们来了，就站起来说道：“贾府的爷们到此了。”贾赦、贾政便依次站定。轿子抬到宫门口，就都下了轿。早有两个小宦官引路，贾母等各有丫头扶着步行。走至元妃寝宫，只见四壁辉煌，琉璃照耀。又有两个小宫女传旨道：“只用请安，一切仪注都免。”

贾府的车马轿子都在西边门停下等待。不久，有两名内监出来宣布：“省亲的太太、奶奶们要入宫去探望，各位爷们要到内宫门外请安，不得入见。”门外人喊着让进宫去。贾府中四乘轿子跟着小内监走在前面，贾家的爷们在轿后步行跟着，命令众人在门外等候。走近宫门，只见有几个老宦官坐在门上。见到他们来了，就站起来说道：“贾府的爷们到此了。”贾赦、贾政便依次站定。轿子抬到宫门口，就都下了轿。早有两个小宦官引路，贾母等各有丫头扶着步行。走至元妃寝宫，只见四壁辉煌，琉璃照耀。又有两个小宫女传旨道：“只用请安，一切仪注都免。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母等谢了恩，来至床前请安毕，元妃都赐了坐。贾母等又告了坐。元妃便问贾母道：“近日身上可好？”贾母扶著小丫头，颤颤巍巍站起来答应道：“托娘娘洪福，起居尚健。”元妃又向邢夫人王夫人问了好。邢王二夫人，站著回了话。元妃又问凤姐家中过的日子若何。凤姐站起来回奏道：“尚可支持。”元妃道：“这几年来，难为你操心！”凤姐正要站起来回奏，只见一个宫女传进许多职名，请娘娘龙目。元妃看时，就是贾赦贾政等若干人。那元妃看了职名，心里一酸，止不住早流下泪来。宫女儿递过绢子，元妃一面拭泪，一面传谕道：“今日稍安，令他们外面暂歇。”贾母等站起来，又谢了恩。元妃含泪道：“父女弟兄，反不如小家子得以常常亲近！”贾母等都忍著泪道：“娘娘不用悲伤，家中已托著娘娘的福多了。”
paragraphs.english:
Please write a story in the style of "The Haunting of Hill House" by Shirley Jackson about a woman who buys an old house that has a dark history. The house is located in a small, secluded town, and the woman is unaware of its past when she buys it. However, as she begins to renovate the house, strange things start to happen. The woman becomes increasingly isolated and paranoid, and soon realizes that the house is haunted by the ghosts of its former occupants. As the ghosts become more and more aggressive, the woman must confront her own fears and find a way to rid the house of their presence. The story should be told in a suspenseful and eerie style, with a focus on building tension and atmosphere. One day, a young woman named Emily decided to move to a small, secluded town for a fresh start. She had heard about the charming old houses in the area and stumbled upon a particularly beautiful one. Without knowing its history, she purchased the house and began renovating it.

However, as she started to delve deeper into the house's past, strange occurrences began to take place. The doors would slam shut on their own, and the windows would shatter with no explanation. The woman tried to brush off the events as mere coincidences, but it wasn't long before she realized that something sinister was lurking within the walls of her new home.

The woman became increasingly isolated and paranoid, unable to shake the feeling that she was being watched. Her once quiet town seemed to fill with an eerie silence, and she began to hear whispers in the dead of night. It wasn't until she discovered the grim history of the house that she truly understood the gravity of her situation.

The house had been the site of a brutal murder decades ago, and the spirits of the victims had never been able to find peace. As Emily became more entrenched in the home, the ghosts grew bolder and more aggressive. Doors slammed more forcefully, and objects were thrown with increasing violence. Emily found herself alone in the house, unable to escape the haunting presence that had taken hold.

Determined to confront her fears, Emily began to research the ghosts that haunted her home. She spoke to local historians, searched old records, and even sought the help of paranormal investigators. As she delved deeper into the history of the house, she uncovered dark secrets and a tragic past that she had never imagined.

In the end, Emily discovered a way to communicate with the ghosts and appease their restless spirits. With the help of a local medium and her own bravery, she was able to perform a ritual that allowed the ghosts to find peace and move on from the house. As the darkness faded, Emily was finally able to breathe a sigh of relief, but she knew that the memories of her haunted home would stay with her forever.

The town, once filled with whispers and eerie silence, slowly returned to its former state. Emily, forever changed by her experiences, moved on to a new chapter in her life, but she would never forget the chilling tale of the haunted house on the outskirts of town.
paragraphs.chinese:
贾母等人谢过恩后，来到床前请安，元妃请她们坐下，贾母等人也都回了礼坐下。元妃问贾母近日可好，贾母站起身来答谢元妃的问候，说托元妃洪福，身体无恙。元妃又问候邢夫人和王夫人，二人站著回了话。元妃又问凤姐家中过的日子如何，凤姐站起来回答说还好过。元妃说：“这几年来，多亏你操劳。”正说话间，一个宫女进来传下元妃的旨意，要元妃传旨。元妃看后，心中一酸，泪流满面。宫女递过手帕，元妃拭了泪，传谕道：“今日先不急，让他们在外面歇息。”贾母等人站起来，又谢过恩。元妃含泪道：“父亲兄弟，还不如普通人能与我亲近！”贾母等人都忍着眼泪说：“娘娘不用悲伤，家中已蒙著娘娘的福泽多了。”

他们谢了恩后，来到床前向元妃请安，元妃请他们坐下。元妃询问起贾母的近况，贾母站起身来应答，感谢元妃的关心，并表示身体尚好。元妃又问候了邢夫人和王夫人，她们也站起身回话。接着，元妃询问了凤姐家中的日子如何，凤姐站起来回答说还可以。元妃感慨道，这几年多亏了凤姐的操劳。谈话间，一位宫女进来传达元妃的旨意，要元妃下达命令。元妃看了旨意后，心生哀伤，泪如雨下。宫女递过手帕，元妃拭去了眼泪，并传旨说今日先不必急，让下属们在外面稍作休息。贾母等人站起来，再次感谢元妃的恩赐。元妃含泪感慨，自己与父亲兄弟相比，反而不如普通人能够常常见面。贾母等人强忍着眼泪，表示娘娘不用悲伤，家中已经享有了娘娘的恩惠。

paragraphs.original: 元妃又问：宝玉近来若何。贾母道：“近来颇肯念书。因他父亲逼得严紧，如今文字也都做上来了。”元妃道：“这样才好。”遂命外宫赐宴。便有两个宫女儿，四个小太监，引了到一座宫里。已摆得齐整，各按坐次坐了。不必细述。
paragraphs.english: Emperor Yuanfei asked about Yu Bi's current state. Grandmother Jia replied, "Recently he has become more studious because of his father's insistence. Now his essays are all finished." Emperor Yuanfei said, "That's good." Then she commanded a feast in her palace. Two palace ladies and four eunuchs led them to a palace where the feast was already laid out, and they all took their seats. No need to elaborate on the details.
paragraphs.chinese: 元妃又问宝玉近来怎么样。贾母说：“近来他肯读书了，因为宝玉的父亲督促得紧，文章都做出来了。”元妃说：“这样才好。”便命宫中宴请。于是有两位宫女，四个小太监，引领他们到一座宫里，早已摆好宴席，大家各就座。不必细说。

paragraphs.original: 一时，吃完了饭，贾母带著他婆媳三人，谢过宴。又耽搁了一回，看看已近酉初，不敢羁留，俱各辞了出来。元妃命宫女儿引道，送至内宫门，门外仍是四个小太监送出。贾母等依旧坐著轿子出来，贾赦接著，大夥儿一齐回去。到家，又要安排明后日进宫，仍应照齐集。不提。
paragraphs.english: It was over in a flash, and the Dowager Grandmother took her and Madam Wang and thanked everyone for their hospitality. They stayed on a little longer, but realized it was nearly six, so they couldn't risk staying any longer, and all said their goodbyes and left. The Empress Consort asked her attendants to guide them, all the way to the palace gates, and then the four small eunuchs sent them off. The Jia family returned on foot, with Jia Sheng to meet them. It was then that they all returned home. The Dowager Grandmother had to immediately start preparing for the following day's visit, and all the arrangements had to be in place. But that was all for another time.
paragraphs.chinese: 一下子吃完饭，贾母带着她和王夫人谢了宴。又多停留了一会，眼看将近酉初，不敢久留，纷纷告辞出来。元妃让宫女们引导，送到宫内门，门外仍由四个小太监送出。贾母她们坐轿子出来，贾赦接上，大家一齐回去。到家，又要准备明后日进宫，仍然应该准备齐全。不提。

paragraphs.original: 且说薛家金桂自赶出薛蟠去了，日间拌嘴，没有对头，秋菱又住在宝钗那边去了，只剩得宝蟾一人同住。既给薛蟠作妾，宝蟾的意气又不比从前了。金桂看去，更是一个对头，自己也后悔不来。一日，吃了几杯闷酒，躺在炕上，便要借那宝蟾做个醒酒汤儿，因问著宝蟾道：“大爷前日出门，到底是到那里去？你自然是知道的了？”宝蟾道：“我那里知道？他在奶奶跟前还不说，谁知道他那些事？”金桂冷笑道：“如今还有什么奶奶太太的，都是你们的世界了！别人是惹不得的，有人护庇著，我也不敢去虎头上捉虱子；你还是我的丫头，问你一句话，你就和我摔脸子，说塞话！你既这么有势力，为什么不把我先勒死了，你和秋菱，不拘谁做了奶奶，那不清净了么？偏我又不死，碍著你们的道儿。”
paragraphs.english: And speaking of Jin Gui, after she chased Xue Pan out, she spent her days bickering with everyone she met. She’d moved into the residence of Bao Chao, leaving Bao Chuan behind as the only one left. Jin Gui had originally been Xue Pan’s concubine, so Bao Chuan’s aura wasn’t any weaker than before. Jin Gui looked at Bao Chuan and felt even more unhappy. This day, after Jin Gui drank a bit too much, she lay in bed, wishing to use Bao Chuan to help her sober up. She asked Bao Chuan, "Where did Xue Pan go the day before yesterday? You should know, shouldn’t you?" Bao Chuan answered, "How would I know? Even his mother doesn’t know where he is. Who knows where he’s gone?" Jin Gui laughed coldly and said, "There’s no ‘mother’ or ‘wife’ anymore. It’s all your world now. You have your own backing. I can’t afford to offend you. I asked you if you’re my servant, and you turned a nasty face at me and said it wasn’t what I wanted to hear! Since you’re so powerful, why didn’t you kill me before so that you could be the wife you want to be? You might as well have asked, ‘Who wants to be the wife? Fine, let’s all just leave.’ But I wouldn’t die! I’m getting in your way!"
paragraphs.chinese: 且说薛家金桂自从赶走了薛蟠，一天到晚跟人拌嘴没对头，宝钗那边秋菱也住过去了，剩下宝蟾一个。金桂本就是薛蟠的妾，宝蟾的气势也不比从前。金桂看宝蟾，心里更不高兴。这天，金桂喝多了酒，躺在床上，想找宝蟾解解酒，便问宝蟾：“薛蟠前天出门，到底是去哪儿了？你不是应该知道的吗？”宝蟾道：“我哪知道？他在奶奶跟前还瞒着呢，谁知道他去了哪儿？”金桂冷笑道：“现在哪还有什么奶奶太太的，都是你们的世界了！你们是有后台的，我不敢去得罪你们。你既是我的丫头，我还问你句话，你却跟我摆脸色，说不中听的话！你既然势力大，为什么不先把我杀了，你们谁想当奶奶，都清净点。偏偏我又不死，碍着你们的路了。”

paragraphs.original: 宝蟾听了这话，那里受得住？便眼睛直直的瞅著金桂道：“奶奶这些闲话只好说给别人听去！我并没合奶奶说什么。奶奶不敢惹人家，何苦来拿著我们小软儿出气呢？正经的，奶奶又装听不见，‘没事人一大堆’了。”说著，便哭天哭地起来。金桂越发性起，便爬下炕来，要打宝蟾。宝蟾也是夏家的风气，半点儿不让。金桂将桌椅杯盏尽行打翻，那宝蟾只管喊冤叫屈，那里理会他？
paragraphs.english: Bao Chán, hearing this, could not endure it at all. She opened her eyes and looked at Jīnguì, saying, "Madam, don’t say such things to me! What have I ever said to you? Why are you taking it out on us just because you can’t make others unhappy? You don’t even bother to think about it, and you want to feign deafness and ignorance. We are the ones who have nothing to do!" With these words, she cried her heart out. Jingui was even more furious and climbed out of bed to hit Bao Chán. Bao Chán did not back down, just like the Xiahua family’s style. Jingui knocked over all the tables, chairs, tea cups, and tea dishes. Bao Chán only cried out her complaints, but Jingui did not care about her.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝蟾听了这话，哪里受得了？便睁大了眼睛看着金桂说：“太太您这种话还是说给别人听吧！我和您没说过什么呀！您不敢惹别人，何必拿我们姐妹俩出气呢？您正经的，也不听听，就想装聋作哑。我们倒成了没事人了。”说着哭得死去活来。金桂更是恼怒，爬下床来要打宝蟾。宝蟾也像夏家的风气，一点也不让。金桂将桌子、椅子、茶杯、茶盘等东西全部打翻，宝蟾只是喊冤叫屈，金桂哪里理会她？

paragraphs.original: 岂知薛姨妈在宝钗房中，听见如此吵闹，便叫：“香菱，你过去瞧瞧，且劝劝他们。”宝钗道：“使不得，妈妈别叫他去。他去了，岂能劝他？那更是火上浇了油了。”薛姨妈道：“既这么样，我自己过去。”宝钗道：“依我说，妈妈也不用去，由著他们闹去罢。这也是没法儿的事了。”薛姨妈道：“这那里还了得！”说著，自己扶了丫头，往金桂这边来。宝钗只得也跟著过去。又嘱咐香菱道：“你在这里罢。”
paragraphs.english: Now, knowing that Xue Yamei heard all the racket in Bao Chai's chamber, she called, "Xiangling, go and calm them down." Bao Chai said, "No, don't send her. She'll only make things worse." Xue Yamei said, "Very well, I'll go myself." Bao Chai said, "Let them quarrel. That's just how it is." Xue Yamei said, "How can I do that?" She took her way to Jincui's chamber, followed by a servant. Bao Chai followed, and she asked Xiangling, "Stay here."
paragraphs.chinese: 哪知道薛姨妈在宝钗的房里听见这种吵闹，便叫：“香菱，你去劝劝他们吧。”宝钗说：“不行啊，妈妈别叫她去。她去了只会更火上浇油。”薛姨妈说：“既然这样，我自己去吧。”宝钗说：“依我说，妈妈不用去了，由着他们闹吧，这也是没有办法的事。”薛姨妈说：“这怎么行啊！”说着自己带着个丫头，往金桂那边去了。宝钗只得也跟着过去，并且还叮嘱香菱：“你在这里吧。”

paragraphs.original: 母女同至金桂房门口，听见里头正还嚷哭不止。薛姨妈道：“你们是怎么著，又这么家翻宅乱起来？这还像个人家儿吗？矮墙浅屋的，难道都不怕亲戚们听见笑话了么？”金桂屋里接声道：“我倒怕人笑话呢！只是这里扫帚颠倒竖，也没主子，也没奴才，也没大老婆，没小老婆，－－都是混账世界了！我们夏家门子里没见过这样规矩，实在受不得你们家这样委屈了！”宝钗道：“大嫂子，妈妈因听见闹得慌才过来的。就是问的急了些，没有分清‘奶奶’‘宝蟾’两字，也没有什么。如今且先把事情说开，大家和和气气的过日子，也省了妈妈天天为偺们操心哪。”薛姨妈道：“是啊，先把事情说开了，你再问我的不是，还不迟呢。”金桂道：“好姑娘，好姑娘！你是个大贤大德的，你日后必定有个好人家，好女婿，决不像我这样守活寡，举眼无亲，叫人家骑上头来欺负的。我是个没心眼儿的人，只求姑娘，我说话，别往死里挑捡！我从小儿到如今，没有爹娘教导。再者，我们屋里老婆、汉子、大女人、小女人的事，姑娘也管不得！”
paragraphs.english: Mother and daughter arrived at the door of Jinguai's room, where they heard her still crying. Lady Xue scolded them, "What are you doing, causing chaos in the house? Is this a proper family? Have you forgotten to be ashamed of our relatives laughing at us?" Jinguai replied from within the room, "I am afraid of being laughed at! But here is a mess, with no one in charge, no one taking responsibility, no master, no servants, no main wife or concubine. It's all chaos! paragraphs.chinese: 母亲和女儿一同来到金桂的房门口，听见金桂还在哭闹不停。薛姨妈责怪道：“你们怎么搞的，家里闹得一塌糊涂？这还算得上是体面人家吗？连矮墙浅屋都不怕亲戚们笑话了吗？”金桂在屋内答道：“我倒是怕被人笑话的！可是这里乱成一团，没人管，没人负责，没有主子，没有奴仆，没有正房小妾，全是一团混乱！我们夏家规矩严明，我们实在无法忍受你们家这样的不公待遇！”宝钗安慰道：“大嫂子，妈妈是听闻情况紧急才过来的。她语气急躁，没分清‘奶奶’和‘宝蟾’，是不应该的。现在先说清楚事情，大家和和睦睦地过日子，也免得妈妈天天为我们操心。”薛姨妈同意道：“说得对，先说清楚事情，然后再追究谁是谁非也不迟。”金桂回应道：“好姑娘，好姑娘！你有智慧和美德，你将来一定会有好人家，好女婿，不像我这样孤单，四处无人关心，任人欺负。我是个心直口快的人，但求你理解，我说话时，不要太过挑剔！从小到大，我没有受到父母的教导。再者，我们家的事，姑娘管不着！”

为什么提升内存会提升速度？

增加内存可以提高计算机系统的性能，因为它可以减少在执行任务时内存瓶颈的可能性。计算机在处理数据时，通常会将数据读取到内存中以便于处理。如果内存不足，计算机需要将部分数据写入硬盘（称为磁盘缓存），然后在需要时再次读取，这将导致大量的I/O操作，从而降低系统性能。

通过增加内存，可以减少这样的数据交换，使计算机能够在内存中存储更多的数据，从而提高处理速度和效率。此外，内存对程序的执行速度影响也很大，因为更快的内存可以提供更快的读写速度，使程序能够以更快的速度执行和响应。

总之，增加内存可以降低系统对硬盘的依赖，减少I/O操作，提高数据处理速度，从而提升整体性能和速度。
